field_speakers.processed: US WeChat Users Alliance (USWUA), the group that successfully litigated the executive order in court

field_description.processed: In August 2020, former President Trump issued an executive order banning the messaging app WeChat. In response to the ban, a group of grassroots activists formed the nonprofit WeChat Users Alliance (USWUA), which successfully litigated the executive order in court. This webinar will feature a conversation with leading members of the USWUA and the litigation team.
